name: Anomaly (chris32156)
description:
Source Code

How To Play

5 People will be randomly generated, your task is to remove the anomaly. 4 Of the 5 people will have the same feature(eyebrows, eye color, hair, shirt color, hair, mouth, basically everything besides skin color and ears) you will have to click on the one without that feature. If you guess right your timer will increase by 5 seconds and if you guess wrong you lose 5 seconds. 

For example, in this picture the correct answer would be the 1st guy. This is because all of the 4 other guys have blue shirts while he has a green shirt.

Game Jam

This game was create for Trijam 89.  The time limit was 3 hours however, that 3 hours could be anytime over a weekend. The theme for it was Remove It! 

Assets Used
  • Graphics - Modular Characters By Kenny
  • Music - Fun Puzzle Quest! By HeatleyBros
  • Game Over Sound Effect - Music Jingles By Kenny
  • For The Rest Of The Sound Effects I Used Sound Effects I Created Before The Jam
